items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous quality and color!
items.body: I bought this dress on an impulse, and I’m so glad I did! I love it! I wear a size xs/2 in most brands, and the small fits perfectly. Due to this, I would say it runs a bit small. I’m also petite, and it comes above the knee. I ordered the maroon/burgundy color and it’s more of a crimson red. However, it’s still gorgeous and was perfect for my daughter’s graduation! Read more
items.author: Christy’s Amazon Finds

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The fabric was great quality!
items.body: So cute & great quality! Soft & comfy. Read more
items.author: Melisa L.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Belt required!
items.body: The material in the middle is not elastic enough to maintain the “bloused” look in the model’s pictures. I had to put a belt on. The material is super soft. The sleeves are a little too oversized. I’m 5’3” and about 115lbs and bought a small. Read more
items.author: Melissa Mattox

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Very nice dress, but too big on me . I had to return it Read more
items.author: Dumitru Balan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and not itchy
items.body: Size small fits perfectly for my 5’2” body and weight of 134 lbs. Not itchy. Comfortable. The length reaches above my knees. I love how the dress cinches in the middle to give me a waist. The color red was not too bright and perfect for our holiday party. Read more
items.author: jmir

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor design
items.body: The puff sleeves are too heavy and just look droopy. Read more
items.author: Autumn S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Looks great.. fits true to size.. feel warm too. Read more
items.author: Mona Malik

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute but big
items.body: Cute but too big / long for a medium size I would go down a size if you’re petite or short Read more
items.author: Sara Jung

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Rose Red, Khaki, White, Beige, Burgundy, Dark Grey, Army Green, Black, Camel, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
